room_title: Escape room "The Illusionist" by Escape Room Novi in Detroit
review: Can’t wait to go back! Took my daughter’s dance group for some bonding/teamwork time and they had a blast! We did the Illusionist room. It was very well set up, a great challenge and the kids are still talking about how much they enjoyed it. We came so close to escaping!

room_title: Escape room "The Illusionist" by Escape Room Novi in Detroit
review: We did the Illusionist room with 10 people. We had 4 kids with us and they were able to contribute quite a bit. Got through in 43 minutes!

room_title: Escape room "The Illusionist" by Escape Room Novi in Detroit
review: We had an amazing time at the escape room this past weekend. The staff were very helpful and the room we did was the best room we have done. The whole group agreed the Illusionist is our new favorite. We can't wait to come back to do the Cabin in the Woods!

room_title: Escape room "The Illusionist" by Escape Room Novi in Detroit
review: We had such a great time in the Illusionist room with the help of Carson! So much fun - can’t wait for the next one!
